name: NBCNews
text:
The Census Bureau is ending its counting efforts on Sept. 30, a month sooner than previously expected.

Enumerators door-knocking to collect responses from those who have not already self-responded online, by phone, or by mail will halt their efforts then. https://t.co/TJur4Rg2xP
